title: FRIDAY 3/26 - eye-popping Pro day performances
itunes:title: FRIDAY 3/26 - eye-popping Pro day performances
description:
College pro days are a chance for players to win over coaches and GM's from around the league, and a couple of Penn State players did just that with their eye-popping 40-yard dash times (0:08). Joe Flacco meeting the Philadelphia media for the first time since joining the team and he talked about mentoring Jalen Hurts (2:07). The Cardinals add a former Super Bowl hero (3:04), while the Seahawks bring back one of their own (3:19)

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
